original_text: Then he would return to Ramah, for his home was there, and there also he judged Israel. And he built there an altar to the Lord.
korean_text: 라마로 돌아왔으니 이는 거기에 자기 집이 있음이니라 거기서도 이스라엘을 다스렸으며 또 거기에 여호와를 위하여 제단을 쌓았더라

sentences.original_text: Then he would return to Ramah,
and there also he judged Israel.
And he built there an altar to the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그는 그곳에 주를 위한 제단을 쌓았습니다.
